If the idea being tested is that spirits are all knowing, and my experiment=
s do not find evidence that is true=C2=A0 (so far) then that is ALL we can =
consider.=C2=A0 Nothing about spirits not-existing or anything else.=C2=A0 =
It is just one claim of many to experment with.=C2=A0 I'm not trying to att=
ack your beliefs.

And I am not attacking Frank.=C2=A0 My posts are usually=
 me defending myself when I am attacked by someone else.

      I agree! I am learning this field, and don't enjoy people criticizing=
 the communication shared. 



And as for RJ's experiments. RJ doesn't want=
 to share any info, not even the city and state where the spirits may find =
him/her. Spirits are people, and not all knowing. We may as well ask RJ (wi=
thout location or full name) what we put on top of our monitors. If he/she =
is wrong, then he/she must not exist, making RJ's posts a figment of our im=
agination.



I haven't been reading RJ's posts for awhile, but when I do, =
and see that RJ is upsetting Frank continuously, and it's Frank's list, tha=
t isn't cool. 



~Draiga

> I realize you have plenty of subjectiv=
e anecdotal evidence.I don't consider that 'hard evidence' however.  I am l=
ooking for something a little more objective and less subject to influence =
and interpretations.

> 

> And stop putting words in my mouth. A person ca=
n misinterpret something, mistake something, or confuse something, without =
lying about something.  And before you jump down my throat claiming I am sa=
ying all results are mistakes, I am not.  I am performing experiments, keep=
ing an open mind, and considering all evidence I find.

> 

> The way you h=
ave been attacking me by calling me names at every turn, just because I try=
 new things and don't always agree with your world view, is eerily reminisc=
ent of the way the church of old tried to suppress new thought and discover=
ies, except you're just substituting the word 'heretic' with 'science'. and=
 'blasphemy' with anything that disagrees with you.

> 

> There's an old s=
aying:  "We become that which we hate".  So far, all you've done is denounc=
e people's efforts to try new methods and see what works.  You accept nothi=
ng anyone else proposes if it does not agree with you.  That is the realm o=
f the extreme skeptic: the same skeptic you ridicule.

> 

> You certainly =
don't have to agree with my comments.  And I don't have to agree with yours=
.  But no one needs all the name calling Frank.   It really adds nothing to=
 support your theories.

> 

> 

>

ince there are different distinct claims about what the box or the recorder=

 and lived with us for many years, and this is his bark for sure.  I'd know=
 that bark anywhere.  Sorry, that I can't make it any clearer, I need to ge=
t one of those better ghost boxes I guess.  RJ, spirits are just like us, t=
hey are not omnipresent like God,  probably why David doesn't want to play =
the guessing game, he has better things to do over there, and has said, the=
y have thousands of people standing in this long line waiting to get into t=
he Heavens, and He can't just drop His job and go to your house to see what=
 you have over there, He did tell me that first time what it was, and i sen=
t it to you, but it was too late.  It's hard for me to understand them some=
times, He was also right about that little boy, Syler being killed, and whe=
re his body would be found,
 I don't know what they did about it though. sf=
